definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 fs. [[לְשׁוֹנׇם בַּצָּמָא נׇשָָׁתָּה]] Is 41:17 (on D. f. affect. v. Ges:§ 20 i); also fig. [[נׇֽשְׁתָה גְבוּרָתָם]] Je 51:30, their might is dry, i.e. fails.

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 pl. consec. [[וְנִשְּׁתו־מַיִם מֵהַיׇּ֑ם]] Is 19:5 and water shall be dried up from the sea; cf. Impf. [[יַנׇּֽתְשׁוּ מַיּם]] Je 18:14, where read prob. [[יִנׇּֽשְׁחוּ]] (Gf Gie al.).
